features: Reveal Your Most Radiant Self: Experience real kojic acid soap that helps make skin tone brighter and clearer. Kojie San Soap helps in diminishing the visibility of dark spots, freckles, acne, stretch marks, uneven skin tone, and other skin tone problems.

Flawless Skin from Head to Toe: Original Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap is a wonderful facial soap for women and men, that also moisturizes and perfects skin appearance. Use this bar soap to help reduce hyperpigmentation, and improve underarms and dark-looking skin on the inner thighs, face and neck.

Lather in Quality Ingredients: We know how sensitive sun-damaged skin can be, so our bar soap for the face and body has glycerin, tea tree, coconut oil, and other natural ingredients to cleanse your skin gently.

Say Goodbye to Dark Spots: This fresh orange-scented face and body soap has Zero Pigment Light Technology to target areas that need extra care to give you more even, smoother glowing skin. Truly the perfect Japanese soap bar

Home of the Original Kojic Acid Soap: Kojie San’s formulation blends effective ingredients to nourish your skin and target blemishes to reveal your inner beauty! Check your product’s authenticity with our Hidden Tag technology.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: REVEAL YOUR MOST RADIANT SELF Experience real kojic acid soap brightening that combats hyperpigmentation, sun & age spots, & other blemishes with the authentic Kojie San Soap. Wash away your skin problems with our professional strength kojic soap. FLAWLESS SKIN FROM HEAD TO TOE The Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap is a face soap for women & men, as well as a moisturizing bar soap for body. Use our hyperpigmentation soap as an underarm soap, dark skin remover for inner thighs, face bar soap, or black neck remover. LATHER IN QUALITY INGREDIENTS We know how sensitive sun damaged skin can be, so our brightening bar soap for face & body has glycerin, tea tree, coconut oil, & other natural ingredients to cleanse your skin gently. SAY GOODBYE TO DARK SPOTS This fresh orange soap-scented skin brightener soap has Zero Pigment Light Technology to target areas that need extra care to give you more even, smoother glowing skin. Truly the perfect Japanese soap bar.

WHAT IS KOJIC ACID? Kojic acid is a natural ingredient derived from mushrooms or produced as a byproduct of fermenting sake, soy sauce, rice wine, & miso. It has a long history of use in Japanese culture & is considered a key component of traditional Japanese skincare. WHAT’S IN EVERY KOJIE SAN PRODUCT? Kojie San offers unique formulations free of parabens & other additives, & are rich with naturally derived extracts that help even your skin tone & address other common skin concerns. WHAT SKIN PROBLEMS DOES IT TARGET? Our face & body products help lessen the appearance of age spots, freckles, red marks, scars, hyperpigmentation, & other visible signs of sun damage. By targeting these skin concerns, our products aim to improve the overall look & texture of your skin, leaving it looking more youthful & radiant. HOME OF THE ORIGINAL KOJIC ACID SOAP Kojie San offers a unique range of skincare products that have been helping people achieve more beautiful, radiant skin for years. Its unique formula features Kojic Acid, which prevents the UV-activation of tyrosinase, which then limits the pigmentation production.

Kojie San Zero Pigment Light Beauty Soap Kojie San Cleanser & Toner Kojie San 5-Pc Set with Travel Pouch Kojie San Kojic Acid Soap with Facial Brush Kojie San 2-Pc Set Kojie San Beauty Soap with Soap Net Inclusions/Key Ingredients Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Kojic Acid, Mushroom & Ginseng Extract, Rose Hip Oil Soap:Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil,&Tea Tree Oil Lotion:Kojic Acid,Rose Hip Oil,Collagen,& Vitamin E Face Cream:Kojic Acid,Rose Hip,&Vitamin E Cleanser & Toner:Kojic Acid,Mushroom & Ginseng Extract,Rose Hip Oil Facial Cleansing Brush Travel Pouch Deep Pore Facial Cleansing Brush Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oi Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Face Cream: Kojic Acid, Rose Hip Oil, & Vitamin E Exfoliating Soap Net Soap: Kojic Acid, Coconut Oil, & Tea Tree Oil Mild Scent ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Formulated with Kojic Acid ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Suitable for Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body Face & Body For All Skin Types ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for some months now for the hyperpigmentation on my face and I have noticed a tremendous difference in the dark spots and how I rarely have any breakouts. What has worked for me is using this soap at night. This soap does dry your skin out a little so remember to apply lots of moisturizer and does tingle the first couple days of using but it works. When I first started I did break out a little as I thought it was a new, harsher product for my sensitive skin but the breakout eventually went away.I use this soap whenever I shower, I first wash my face with CeraVe gentle face wash, rinse, and then follow up with this soap but after I apply I let it sit on my face for the remainder of my shower and wash it off before I get out. I apply my toner which is witch hazel or Ordinary glycolic acid toner (depending on the night), Aveeno skin relief moisturizer, tretinoin cream (prescribed by my dermatologist), and La Roche double repair face moisturizer with SPF. My skin last looked this good a while ago. I highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: love this soap , it has cleared my dark spots , although i will say you have to be consistent for a result over all i loved this purchase .. it has an orange scented smell , the only down side is that it makes my skin a little dry .. if this happens to you just moisturize afterwards it helps a lot !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Help clear spots
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Help with my spots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I try to use this twice a week and it has greatly reduced the darker areas on my body. They are small bars of soap but I stretched its use by making sure to keep it out of the shower after use (it gets smaller quicker when its in constant contact with water) and creating a thick lather to spread on my body so I'm not using too much of the soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It broke me out…
reviews.reviewText: I feel like the soap was working and then BOOM I broke out in hives and I have a allergenic breakout on my face…my skin is now super dry and I believe I have to repair my skin barrier again. This is the only thing new I added to my routine. After looking back at the reviews I’m not the only person this has happened too and I also don’t have sensitive skin so if I were you I would use at your own risk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bar smells like citrus and it works great on lightening dark spots and skin. I would use this with a combination of other things too. It’s great for oily skin too, kinda helps balance it out. Definitely will continue using it but I love it with turmeric and honey.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it does what its supposed to
reviews.reviewText: i cant find my spot blemish remover here and am reluctant to switch to a different product. so i went back to this soap which i am familiar with. its definitely strong. i would not recommend using it on the face everyday. i only use it on the specific dark spots as i have been having breakouts lately. and am using it on my inner thighs and armpits. yet to see the results but its been a little over 2 weeks though i don't use it everyday because it burns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried to lighten hyperpigmentation marks on my neck and jawline using dermatologist prescribed tretinoin and Azelaic acid with little results, and after using this soap sparingly I had amazing results. My marks are much lighter and less noticeable even though I’ve used it less than 8 times in the past 3 weeks. It is very drying (along with my prescription products) so I can’t use it frequently. Moisture well afterwards.Tip: if you’re going to use it for areas on the body (inner thighs, underarms etc and even your face), use it while dry in the shower. Lather with water on your hands, rub on the trouble spots, wait and then turn on the water to rinse off (that way it doesn’t travel to the lady bits and cause ph balance issues).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well use twice a week
Depuis que j utilise ce savon, ma peau va de mieux en mieux. Mon teint est devenu unifié après quelques semaines d’utilisation. Je le recommande à l’utiliser sur le long terme pour voir les résultats
J'ai acheté le produit a cause des taches et nombreux boutons sur mon visage. Apres 1 semaine et demi d'utilisation, le résultat est présent!!! Mon teint brille et est plus clair, j'adore.
It makes my face bright ,clear and shiny i will always buy it again and again
I just like few months back and I love this product especially you have a tanning
